name: Devil's Land
description:
Experience a real taste of fighting in the game "Devil's Land"

Battle the environment of the ruins in the game where your main enemies are demons. You will be available 4 types of weapons: Pistol, shotgun, machine gun and flamethrower. In the game you have different goals, each level hides a mission you want to achieve. You can also collect ammo as well as replenish your health with various elixirs.
